strapiPost.title: Hunting and Fishing Seasons Begin
strapiPost.content:
With autumn and hunting season upon us, events are ramping with the Arkansas Game and Fish Commission (AGFC). 

  • Hunting: The season for small game has already begun and will last until the end of February, as will the archery season for deer after it starts on Sep 24. Northwest Arkansas zone dates for muzzleloaders, moderns, and a special youth modern hunt are listed here. Bear and elk season dates will also vary. 
  • Fishing: National Hunting and Fishing day is Sep 24, and the AGFC will be celebrating with fishing events across the state, the closest being at Lake Centerton. 

Read the Arkansas Money & Politics story HERE.
